channel.title: Command help
channel.description: some one plz show me how 2 make commands, i need to add some new ones on pimpscape :)

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter"))
{
addItem (995,15000000);
}

For example, that would give them 15M.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows"))
{
addItem (4716,1);
addItem (4718,1);
addItem (4720,1);
addItem (4722,1);
addItem (4724,1);
addItem (4726,1);
addItem (4728,1);
addItem (4730,1);
addItem (4732,1);
addItem (4734,1);
addItem (4736,1);
addItem (4738,1);
addItem (4740,250);
addItem (4745,1);
addItem (4747,1);
addItem (4749,1);
addItem (4751,1);
addItem (4753,1);
addItem (4755,1);
addItem (4757,1);
addItem (4759,1);
addItem (4708,1);
addItem (4710,1);
addItem (4712,1);
addItem (4714,1);
}

And that command would give them ALL barrows, itâ€™s easy as pie and to the item ID spots you can change the item ID to any item ID you want. Put them with your other commands and Voila. Your done!
